sphinx >= 1.2.2, < 2

[dev]
sphinx_rtd_theme >= 0.1.6, < 1
lowdown >= 0.1.0, < 2
pytest-runner >= 2.7, < 3
pytest >= 2.9, < 3
pytest-mock >= 0.11, < 1
pytest-catchlog >= 1, < 2
pytest-xdist >= 1.1, < 2
pytest-cov >= 2, < 3

[doc]
sphinx_rtd_theme >= 0.1.6, < 1
lowdown >= 0.1.0, < 2

[test]
pytest-runner >= 2.7, < 3
pytest >= 2.9, < 3
pytest-mock >= 0.11, < 1
pytest-catchlog >= 1, < 2
pytest-xdist >= 1.1, < 2
pytest-cov >= 2, < 3
